jade.core.behaviours.ReceiverBehaviour.Handle

Packages that use ReceiverBehaviour.Handle
Package
Description
jade.core.behaviours
This package is a subpackage of jade.core and contains the classes used to implement basic agent behaviours.

    ReceiverBehaviour(Agent a, ReceiverBehaviour.Handle h, long millis)
